newsitem.title: UK: Blue Circle says UK cement business gains.
newsitem.headline: Blue Circle says UK cement business gains.

text.p: Britain's biggest cement producer, Blue Circle Industries Plc, said on Friday its UK cement business had gained during the first four months of the year.
Blue Circle's chairman Lord Tugendhat told the annual meeting the UK cement business had gained from increased demand and prices in the first four months.
"Demand prospects are strong for the remainder of this year," he added.
In the bathroom division, he said no improvement had yet been seen in the UK or Italian markets.

In the group's heating division, the full effects of last year's restructuring are expected to enhance that division's profits this year. Demand in the UK and France got off to a strong start before the milder weather set in.
Tugendhat said that Blue Circle America continued to advance in the first four months and a strong market is now expected for the year as a whole.
Elsewhere overseas, the group's Malaysian business is still performing well, while the outlook in Chile is for more cement demand growth, but at a lower rate than last year.
